REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1314 reute u f BC-S.-AFRICAN-CONSUMER-I 10-20 0074

TEXT.TITLE: S. AFRICAN CONSUMER INFLATION FALLS IN SEPTEMBER
TEXT.BODY: South African year-on-year consumer price inflation in September fell to 15.5 pct from 16.3 pct in August, Central Statistics Office figures show. The monthly rise in the all items index (base 1980) was 1.3 pct to 273.4 in September after edging up to 270.0 in August. A year ago the index stood at 236.7 and year-on-year consumer price inflation at 19.7 pct. REUTER
